Protestatio serenissimi & celsissimi principis Caroli Ludovici. English
titleStmt.author: Karl Ludwig, Elector Palatine, 1617-1680.

titleStmt.title: A protestation of the most high and mighty Prince Charles Lodowicke, Count Palatine of the Rhine, archidapifer, and prince elector of the sacred empire, Duke of Bavaria, &c. translated out of the High-Dutch ...
Protestatio serenissimi & celsissimi principis Caroli Ludovici. English
titleStmt.author: Karl Ludwig, Elector Palatine, 1617-1680.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Protestatio serenissimi & celsissimi principis Caroli Ludovici.
"Given at Hampton-court, the 27. of January, anno 1637"--Colophon.
Reproductions of originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art (reel 1229) and Harvard University. Library (1748).
